net.windward.RoboRally.api

Enum MapSquare.DIRECTION

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<MapSquare.DIRECTION>
      • net.windward.RoboRally.api.MapSquare.DIRECTION
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<MapSquare.DIRECTION>
    Enclosing class:
    MapSquare

    public static enum MapSquare.DIRECTION
extends java.lang.Enum<MapSquare.DIRECTION>
    The direction a robot or laser is facing. Also used for direction a conveyor is running (exit for a turn).

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      EAST
      Facing East and can fire on units to the right.
      NORTH
      Facing North and can fire on units above.
      SOUTH
      Facing South and can fire on units below.
      WEST
      Facing West and can fire on units to the left.
